name: Pandzer
printed_effect: This Pandzer gets +1 {defense} for each {earth} Enchanting it. You can Nexus up to {earth}{earth}. When you do, you can return {earth} from your Underworld to your Spirit Deck or Enchant {earth} from your Underworld to this Pandzer.
effect: You can Nexus up to {earth}{earth}. This Pandzer gets +1 {defense} for each {earth} Enchanting it. When you do, you can return {earth} from your Underworld to your Spirit Deck or Enchant {earth} from your Underworld to this Pandzer.
